import React from 'react'; import './Films.css'; class Films extends React.Component { render() { const CLASS_BOX = 'movieBox'; const classesComedy = `${CLASS_BOX} comedy`; const classesDramas = `${CLASS_BOX} dramas`; const classesScience = `${CLASS_BOX} scienceFiction`; const classesHorrors = `${CLASS_BOX} horrors`; return (

) } } export default Films;
